content.eq: Li(s,x) = SUM(k, 1, oo, x ^ k / k ^ s)

content.goal: x / (1 - x) = SUM(k, 1, oo, x ^ k)

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting x / (1 - x) to x * (1 - x) ^ (-1)

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting x * SUM(n, 0, oo, x ^ n) to SUM(n, 0, oo, x * x ^ n)

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting x * x ^ n to x ^ 1 * x ^ n

rule.latex_str: rewrite \(x ^ {1} x ^ {n}\) to \(x ^ {n + 1}\) using identity at 0
rule.name: ApplyIdentity
rule.str: rewrite x ^ 1 * x ^ n to x ^ (n + 1) using identity at 0

proof.goal: x / (1 - x) = SUM(k, 1, oo, x ^ k)

rule.eq: x / (1 - x) = SUM(k, 1, oo, x ^ k)
rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation: x / (1 - x) = SUM(k, 1, oo, x ^ k)

rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation: Li(0,x) = x / (1 - x) at 0.0

steps.res: INT t:[0,x]. SUM(k, 1, oo, t ^ k) / t

rule.eq: x / (1 - x) = SUM(k, 1, oo, x ^ k)
rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation: x / (1 - x) = SUM(k, 1, oo, x ^ k) at 0.0

steps.res: INT t:[0,x]. 1 / t * SUM(k, 1, oo, t ^ k)

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting SUM(k, 1, oo, t ^ k) / t to 1 / t * SUM(k, 1, oo, t ^ k)

steps.res: INT t:[0,x]. SUM(k, 1, oo, 1 / t * t ^ k)

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting 1 / t * SUM(k, 1, oo, t ^ k) to SUM(k, 1, oo, 1 / t * t ^ k)

steps.res: INT t:[0,x]. SUM(k, 1, oo, t ^ (-1) * t ^ k)

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting 1 / t * t ^ k to t ^ (-1) * t ^ k

steps.res: INT t:[0,x]. SUM(k, 1, oo, t ^ (-1 + k))

rule.latex_str: rewrite \(t ^ {-1} t ^ {k}\) to \(t ^ {-1 + k}\) using identity at 0.0
rule.name: ApplyIdentity
rule.str: rewrite t ^ (-1) * t ^ k to t ^ (-1 + k) using identity at 0.0

steps.res: SUM(k, 1, oo, INT t:[0,x]. t ^ (-1 + k))
INT t:[0,x]. SUM(k, 1, oo, k ^ (-s - 1) * t ^ k) / t

rule.name: Equation
rule.old_expr: SUM(k, 1, oo, k ^ (-s - 1) * t ^ k) / t
rule.str: rewriting SUM(k, 1, oo, k ^ (-s - 1) * t ^ k) / t to t ^ (-1) * SUM(k, 1, oo, k ^ (-s - 1) * t ^ k)

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting t ^ (-1) * SUM(k, 1, oo, k ^ (-s - 1) * t ^ k) to SUM(k, 1, oo, t ^ (-1) * (k ^ (-s - 1) * t ^ k))

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting t ^ (-1) * (k ^ (-s - 1) * t ^ k) to t ^ (-1) * t ^ k * k ^ (-s - 1)

rule.latex_str: rewrite \(t ^ {-1} t ^ {k}\) to \(t ^ {-1 + k}\) using identity at 0.0.0
rule.name: ApplyIdentity
rule.str: rewrite t ^ (-1) * t ^ k to t ^ (-1 + k) using identity at 0.0.0

steps.res: D x. SUM(k, 1, oo, (-x + 1) ^ k / k ^ 2)

rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation: Li(s + 1,x) = (INT t:[0,x]. Li(s,t) / t) at 0.0

rule.name: IntegrationByParts
rule.str: integrate by parts u -> log(1 - t) ^ 2, v -> log(t)

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting log(t) * log(-t + 1) / (-t + 1) to log(t) / (1 - t) * log(-t + 1)

rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation: (D x. Li(2,1 - x)) = log(x) / (1 - x) at 0.1.0.0

rule.latex_str: integrate by parts \(u \to \log{(-t + 1)}, v \to \operatorname{Li}(2,1 - t)\) at 0.1
rule.name: IntegrationByParts
rule.str: integrate by parts u -> log(-t + 1), v -> Li(2,1 - t) at 0.1

rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation: (D x. -Li(3,1 - x)) = Li(2,-x + 1) / (-x + 1) at 0.0.1.0

rule.name: IntegrationByParts
rule.str: integrate by parts u -> log(1 + t) ^ 2, v -> log(t)

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting log(t) to log((1 + t) * (t / (1 + t)))

rule.latex_str: rewrite \(\log{((1 + t) (\frac{t}{1 + t}))}\) to \(\log{(1 + t)} + \log{(\frac{t}{1 + t})}\) using identity at 0.0.1.0.0.0
rule.name: ApplyIdentity
rule.str: rewrite log((1 + t) * (t / (1 + t))) to log(1 + t) + log(t / (1 + t)) using identity at 0.0.1.0.0.0

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting INT t:[0,x]. log(t + 1) ^ 2 / (t + 1) to INT t:[0,x]. log(t + 1) ^ 2

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting log(t + 1) / (t + 1) * log(t / (t + 1)) to log(t / (1 + t)) / (1 + t) * log(t + 1)

rule.latex_str: apply equation \(\frac{d}{dx} \operatorname{Li}(2,\frac{1}{1 + x}) = \frac{\log{(\frac{x}{1 + x})}}{1 + x}\) at 0.0.0.1.0.0
rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation: (D x. Li(2,1 / (1 + x))) = log(x / (1 + x)) / (1 + x) at 0.0.0.1.0.0

rule.latex_str: integrate by parts \(u \to \log{(t + 1)}, v \to \operatorname{Li}(2,\frac{1}{1 + t})\) at 0.0.0.1
rule.name: IntegrationByParts
rule.str: integrate by parts u -> log(t + 1), v -> Li(2,1 / (1 + t)) at 0.0.0.1
